snippet: Cincinnati pitcher Anthony DeSclafani gave up two runs and struck out a career-high nine in holding off St. Louis for a second straight start.
abstract: Baseball Roundup; Cincinnati Reds defeat St Louis Cardinals, 3-2; other baseball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Cincinnati pitcher Anthony DeSclafani gave up two runs and struck out a career-high nine in holding off St. Louis for a second straight start.

headline.print_headline: Reds Rookie Subdues Cardinals in Encore Performance
headline.main: Reds Rookie Subdues Cardinals in Encore Performance
